acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using ParkeoYa, you accept these Terms and Conditions. This service is provided under professional ethics principles of ACM, IEEE, and CIP (Colegio de Ingenieros del Perú), ensuring quality, transparency, and user protection.

service.title: 2. Use of Service
service.content: ParkeoYa provides a platform to search, reserve, and pay for parking spaces in real-time using IoT technology. Users agree to use the service legally and responsibly, respecting parking regulations and other users' rights.

responsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content: Users must provide accurate information, comply with parking regulations, and use the platform ethically. Drivers must respect reservation times, and parking lot owners must ensure their spaces are properly managed and available.

privacy.title: 4. Privacy and Data Protection
privacy.content: We protect your personal data according to current regulations. We collect only necessary information to provide the service and will never share it with third parties without your consent. See our Privacy Policy for more details.

modifications.title: 5. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes via email or through the platform. Continued use after modifications constitutes acceptance of new terms.

ethics.title: Professional Ethics
ethics.content: This project is developed under the ethical principles of ACM, IEEE, and CIP, committing to integrity, transparency, social responsibility, and excellence in service.

scrum.title: Scrum Development Lifecycle
scrum.intro: ParkeoYa was developed following the Scrum agile methodology, which allowed us to deliver value incrementally and adapt to changes efficiently.

phase1.title: Sprint Planning
phase1.description: We defined user stories and prioritized features based on user value and technical feasibility.

phase2.title: Daily Standups
phase2.description: Daily synchronization meetings to identify blockers and maintain team alignment.

phase3.title: Sprint Development
phase3.description: 2-week sprints where we implemented features, conducted code reviews, and performed continuous testing.

phase4.title: Sprint Review
phase4.description: Demonstrations of completed functionality to stakeholders and gathering feedback.

phase5.title: Sprint Retrospective
phase5.description: Team reflection to identify improvements and optimize the development process.

github.title: Version Control with GitHub
github.intro: We use GitHub as our collaborative development platform and version control system:

feature1.title: Branching Strategy
feature1.description: We implement GitFlow with main, develop, and feature branches for organized workflow.

feature2.title: Pull Requests
feature2.description: All changes go through code review before merging to ensure quality and knowledge sharing.

feature3.title: Continuous Integration
feature3.description: Automated tests run on each commit to maintain code stability.

feature4.title: Issue Tracking
feature4.description: We manage bugs, features, and tasks through GitHub Issues with clear labels and assignments.
